items.content:
HI Elizabeth, 

Thank you for your submitting request for end-to-end live streaming consultancy. Our team, MPO LIVE, supports GBS and their key advertisers that go live on TikTok with CI to LIVE campaigns. 


As mentioned on MPO Livestream Support - FAQ for GBS and PMM, we require at least 2 week notice before the live event. Your request does not meet this requirement. However, we might be able to provide some limited support in this case.


Please note that with other live stream, similar to yours, we usually start working with GBS and their advertiser 1-2 months before going live. In your case is less than one week and with significant time differences (I am based in London). So it will be quite challenging, and I can not guarantee the success of this activation. 


Let me know if you are interested in my limited support. If so, I would appreciate it if you could answer the following questions:

1) What is your client plans for the live stream? What will be the actual content shown on screen? 

2) Have they gone live on TikTok before?

3) What time will they start their live stream on 12 Feb 2024? 

4) You mentioned they would go live for 24 hour duration? Is this correct? What will be the content for this 24 hour stream? 

5) What is the client ad spending budget on CI to Live campaign?

6) What is their budget for this live stream campaign in total (including pre-live, mid-live and post-live campaigns)?
7) Have they run CI to LIVE campaign before?

Looking forward to hearing from you back. 


Best,

Itay, MPO LIVE

Hi There,

Thank you for getting back to me so quickly!

Completely understand we are against SLA's here, thank you for helping where you can.


I'd love some support on what is required in terms of the link/click-through URL we set up in TTAM. Is this determined on the clients 3rd party software? or TikTok Live Studio? Are they able to set up a pre-live link for the live for us to implement in TTAM ahead of the live going live?


1) What is your client plans for the live stream? What will be the actual content shown on screen? 

  • This campaign is a collab with Netflix Rebel Moon limited edition Smiths chips on TikTok. It's quite an unusual concept but we will be live streaming a farm, where alien ships come down and invade the chip farm. It's roughly a 2 hour live on loop and chopped up.

2) Have they gone live on TikTok before?

  • The particular client hasn't gone live on TikTok before, however we understand that the creative agency in charge of the live have done this before. I am waiting on confirmation of this and if they have set up paid amplification to the live.

3) What time will they start their live stream on 12 Feb 2024? 

  • This is TBD

4) You mentioned they would go live for 24 hour duration? Is this correct? What will be the content for this 24 hour stream? 

  • It's roughly a 2 hour live on loop and chopped up of the above farm invasion.

5) What is the client ad spending budget on CI to Live campaign?

  • It's roughly $50,000 USD

6) What is their budget for this live stream campaign in total (including pre-live, mid-live and post-live campaigns)?

  • $50k - $70K

7) Have they run CI to LIVE campaign before?

  • No they haven't

Hi Elizabeth, 


Thanks for your reply and the useful information.


Firstly, I would warmly recommend you reading my FAQ doc about going live in TT. It has lots of relevant information for you. It has short questions and short answers that allow you to learn quickly about important matters: 
https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/XGTdd55cso2DpMxs17ClMrxagYb


I'll try to answer your questions, note some important matters and write you some action items you need to take asap. 


I'd love some support on what is required in terms of the link/click-through URL we set up in TTAM. Is this determined on the clients 3rd party software? or TikTok Live Studio?

Sorry that I am not sure exactly what you are asking, but I will try to answer. Community Interaction to LIVE (CI to LIVE) does not have click through URL. The CI to LIVE advert appears on the ForYou page on the TikTok app. User that clicks this advert, goes to the live stream. From the live stream page (called LIVE room) it is not possible to have a link to direct users to an external URL. This is TT policy for legal, safety and security reasons. 


If that was not your question, and you were asking about how to stream to TT using a professional streaming software (instead of using the mobile device camera with the TT app), please check my answer in my FAQ: 
https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/XGTdd55cso2DpMxs17ClMrxagYb#JMecdWIQeo6CKCxsbeKljcnQgzf

Are they able to set up a pre-live link for the live for us to implement in TTAM ahead of the live going live?

Your client can set up an event anchor on their TT account. This means that on their TT bio page, the date and time of their live stream will be mentioned. They can also promote this registration using spark ads. More info on my FAQ doc: 
https://bytedance.sg.larkoffice.com/docx/XGTdd55cso2DpMxs17ClMrxagYb#WYIydiAG0oeYcaxs9a5l5RHvgGf


It's roughly a 2 hour live on loop and chopped up of the above farm invasion.

CI to LIVE campaigns are limited to up to 24 hours maximum. So far we haven't had a client that streamed LIVE for 24 hours. The maximum duration we had was 8-10 hours. 


What time will they start their live stream on 12 Feb 2024? 

This is TBD

They must finalise the start time asap. It effects many processes that you will need to do in order to ensure their live stream goes smoothly. These processes take time and are based on start and end time. 


Here are actions that you need to take ASAP: 

1) Allowlist CI to Live - To use Community Interaction to Live, you will need to allowlisted your client (it's still in Beta). Please add the client's details to the following list. Here: CI to LIVE - Allowlist Request tracker. More information about CI to Live here: [Commdoc] Community Interaction to LIVE (Beta) Process time: 5 working days


2) TnS protection - to minimise the risk of TnS banning this live stream, it is recommended to apply for TnS protection. Otherwise it is most likely TnS to ban this live stream due to its nature, duration and streaming method. Please apply for Full Protection by filling out this form here: vcp.to/tns . The max protection period is 24 hours, and it's very rare TnS approves such a long protection but please apply. You will need to know the start time and end time (Beijing time zone). Process time: 4-6 working days


3) MI exemption - As you might know, all adverts are being reviewed by MI to meet the TikTok advertising policy. In CI to Live the advert creative is the live stream. To avoid MI rejecting the campaign during the live stream, please apply for MI Exemption. Fill out this form: vcp.to/mi  . You will need to know the start time and end time (Beijing time zone and UTC). Process time: 5-7 working days


4) OBS Access / LIVE Studio access - your client's account doesn't have access to OBS/RTMP Live (which means going live using professional streaming software). TT gives access for only 7 days, therefore you should apply now. Video guide on how to apply here. Doc here. Process time: 2-4 working days


I hope this information is useful.


Best, 

Itay Filiba, MPO LIVE

Hi Elizabeth, 

an URGENT message: I have just been informed that the TnS protection and MI Exemption teams will be on leave 9-18 Feb. They won't process any requests during this period.

I would recommend applying for TnS protection and MI Exemption now. 

Please note that even if you apply now, it's out of their 5-7 days SLA. But you can at least try. 

Best,

Itay

Hi Elizabeth, 

Is your client going live as planned on 12 Feb? If so What time? 

Have you had the chance to take any of the actions I recommended above?

Best regards, 

Itay

Hi Elizabeth, 

I have not hear from you back and I noticed your client did not go live yesterday as planned. 

Our support for this live stream has now ended.  

For future support, please request our service at least 2 weeks in advance. Please request our support here

Best regards, 

Itay, MPO LIVE

items.content:
Please assist, we are flying blind here.

We completely understand this is a rather short turnaround time, however were under the impression it was a lot easier than we are now aware.

Thank you so much
